name: Innertale
description:
Overview

Innertale is a 2D fanmade RPG with elements of bullet hell bossfight based on Deltarune. Featuring familiar faces and references to those who have already played the official games, it offers a completely independent and short story.

It touches on internal struggles and presents 3 different endings depending on your battle style as well as 2 new original songs.

Publishing permission granted by fangamer.com

For more content follow me on twitter @JordiAragonC
